about.about_description_below: With a solid foundation in technology and design, I am always striving for innovation and skill improvement to deliver high-quality solutions. My focus is to combine functionality and aesthetics in every project.
about.about_description: I am a specialist in developing comprehensive applications, with a strong emphasis on dynamic interfaces using React. I possess robust skills in back-end development with Node.js and PostgreSQL. I completed my degree in Systems Analysis and Development at UNINASSAU in December 2023.

about_skills.title: React and Interactive Interfaces:
about_skills.description: Building responsive UI/UX designs focused on usability and engagement.

about_skills.title: Back-End Technologies:
about_skills.description: Experience with Node.js, Express, and PostgreSQL for developing robust APIs.

about_skills.title: API Integration:
about_skills.description: Utilizing Axios for efficient communication between front-end and back-end.

about_skills.title: Design and Landing Pages:
about_skills.description: Creating layouts that maximize conversion rates and enhance user experience.

about_skills.title: Technical Training:
about_skills.description: Degree in Systems Analysis and Development, with a focus on market practices.

work.work_subtitle: A collection of the most impactful projects, chosen to represent quality and dedication in every detail. Explore some of my best results.

projects.name: Restaurant Platform
projects.description: Development of a complete platform for restaurants, with Stripe integration for payments, an administrative dashboard, and modern technologies such as React, Axios, Prisma, and PostgreSQL to ensure high performance and security.

projects.name: Professional Landing Page
projects.description: A modern and responsive landing page, created with React and Tailwind to optimize user experience and ensure high performance. Focused on conversion and security, it includes integration with SSL certificates to protect data and strengthen the brand's digital presence.

projects.name: Professional Portfolio
projects.description: Personal portfolio developed with React, Vite, and TailwindCSS, created as part of the foundation of my software house. Focused on intuitive design and responsive functionality, the project demonstrates expertise in web solutions and strengthens the brand's digital identity.

projects.name: Pet Management System
projects.description: Development of a complete pet management system with CRUD functionalities, using Next.js. The project was created for a selection process, demonstrating experience in backend and frontend development with a focus on performance and scalability.

projects.name: Movies Application
projects.description: Development of an application that performs GET requests to an external movie API using Axios. The application displays detailed information about movies, including star ratings and relevant data, providing an interactive and informative experience for the user.

projects.name: Pixel Game
projects.description: Prototype of a pixelated game in JavaScript, created to demonstrate battle logic. The game features dynamic combats in a retro world, illustrating fundamental programming and game design concepts.

projects.name: Dog Breed Matcher
projects.description: Application that fetches images of dog breeds from an API. Each image allows users to compare the appearance of the breed with their own dog, aiding in visual identification and exploring breed diversity. Developed with React and Axios.

footer.text: Tell Me About Your Next Project
